parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post does not contain a CMF number.  While the absence of a CMF number doesn't automatically exclude it from being electoral propaganda, it suggests it might not be directly linked to an officially registered campaign.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions "Alternativa pentru Demnitate Nationala" (ADN), a political party participating in the parliamentary elections. This directly satisfies Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>This is a paid Facebook post, inherently designed to reach a wide audience.  The targeting data shows a significant reach across various age and gender demographics in Ialomița County. This satisfies Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The post's text, "Anunt important," coupled with the mention of ADN, strongly suggests an electoral objective. The timing of the post, and the fact that it's a paid advertisement, further reinforces this. The objective is clearly to increase awareness and potentially support for ADN. This satisfies Article 36 (7) - c.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post lacks any journalistic elements. It's a simple announcement, not an analysis, opinion piece, or news report. It does not provide information about the electoral process or voting procedures.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The post does not express a personal opinion; it's a direct announcement related to a political party participating in the elections.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>920139606746512</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers directly to a specific candidate (ADN), targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook advertisement, and has a clear electoral objective (raising awareness and potentially garnering support for ADN).  The post's simplicity and lack of journalistic content further solidify its classification as electoral propaganda.  The fact that the post was published after the official campaign period ended (assuming the end date in the metadata refers to the end of the campaign period) is a significant factor.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Alternativa pentru Demnitate Nationala</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>FRP TV</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Federatia Romanilor de Pretutindeni, pentru incalcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024 a unei reclame pe Facebook (ID postare: 920139606746512), cu un buget de 300-399 RON, care promoveaza Alternativa pentru Demnitate Nationala, cu mesajul "Anunt important", avand ca efect electoral cresterea vizibilitatii si a sprijinului pentru acest partid.  Postarea, lipsita de elemente jurnalistice, indeplineste toate criteriile materialului de propaganda electorala conform art. 36 (7) din LEGE nr. 334/2006, fiind difuzata dupa incheierea campaniei electorale, fapt ce constituie o incalcare grava a legislatiei in vigoare.  Reclama a atins o audienta estimata intre 100.000 si 500.000 de persoane, conform datelor din Ad Library, cu informatii de contact disponibile: sedecoro@gmail.com si +40774533702.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
